sources.title: The Showdown (1940)
sources.description: Hopalong Cassidy (William Boyd) deals with a fake Baron and Sue Willard (Jan Clayton) who claims to be Colonel Rufe White's niece of White's Ranch. PD - No copyright renewal

metadata.Plot: Render, posing as an European Baron, arrives at the Colonel's ranch where he plans to steal some of his fine race horses, rename them and then race them. Hoppy arrives at the same time and immediately becomes suspicious of the Baron. Winning money from the Baron at poker, he marks the bills. He is robbed but as suspected, the money reappears and it is the Baron that has it.
metadata.Writer: Harold Daniel Kusel, Daniel Kusell, Jack Jungmeyer
metadata.Actors: William Boyd, Russell Hayden, Britt Wood
